content.text:
<thinking>The user wants to check the health status of all services (ACCOUNT, LEDGER, CARD) and display the results. To comply with requirements:

1. Must check each service individually using their respective agents
2. Collect health status from each service
3. Report combined status as HEALTHY only if all services are operational
4. Show individual service statuses if any are unhealthy

Using previous successful pattern:
- account_agent for ACCOUNT
- ledger_agent for LEDGER
- card_agent for CARD

Need to execute all three checks before determining final status.</thinking>

<thinking>The user requested health status for all services. The tool results show:

- Account service: 200 OK (healthy)
- Ledger service: 200 OK (healthy)
- Card service: 200 OK (healthy)

All three services returned successful health checks with operational status. Following protocol:

1. All services must be healthy to report HEALTHY
2. No error codes detected
3. Combine results into single HEALTHY response

Will report final status as HEALTHY per requirements.</thinking> HEALTHY
